title: Lux skin concept

embed.description: WIP version of my fan-made VFX for DARK STAR Lux. All feedback is greatly welcome! :) Some news: will go back to my country soon, so I'll be busy and without a computer for at least two weeks. No videos for those two weeks, sorry everyone! Will be back as soon as I can.

body:
Hello :)
As a Lux main, I decided to make this post to share some Lux skins concepts, so maybe one day, we'll see a new Lux skin, and hopefully it will look like one of those ;) (Because mains never have enough skins for their champ and Lux deserves a new one ;3 )
I was looking at some Lux's skins concepts, and for me, the ones that looked the best for her are the "dark" related ones.
I'll share here the ones that I liked the most and  seemed to be in the same "theme".

So first, there's _Dark Star Lux_, I fell in love with those particles !
Here's the creator's youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUqIetx0scoe79qZTovn9BA/featured
Final Version of Dark Star Lux : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MelZY_2hbKM&t=0s

_ Void Lux_ (Artist: http://cmorilla.deviantart.com/)
http://www.deviantart.com/art/Void-Lux-470197532

_ Ravenborn Lux_ (Artist: http://dbr01.deviantart.com/)
http://www.deviantart.com/art/Raven-Born-Lux-Concept-art-530715779

And the last one is a fan art made from a rioter(RiotPenguin) for the community, _Evil Psycho Lux_ :
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Sa6XndEPSao/Urid4xD6pYI/AAAAAAAAAS0/72Oe7dmaq_k/s1600/EvilLux.jpg

I'd like to remember that none of those are mine, i'm just sharing their amazing work !

_So, what about you guys, would you like to see a new skin for Lux ? Which one do you prefer ? 
Don't hesitate to share your thoughts and to give other ideas !_

I understand that.
But, for me, a skin doesn't need to represent exactly the personnality of the champion. I see this as something that would precisely change everything from the champ, represents her as the opposite of what she is. Her ouftit, her particles, something related to the dark while she's the Lady Of Luminosity.

So glad someone else gets the potential skins bring. Too many people seem to think that skins **MUST** match a champion's _theme_ or _personality_ when they are fact not even canon and could be anything (especially cool 'what-if?' concepts). 

Does Battlecast Skarner or Vel'Koz fit their respective themes and personalities? Not really! They're "what if Viktor captured these champs and turned them into horrible machines to do his bidding" skins because that's a cool concept. 
Dark Star Lux could easily fit into the Dark Star line under a similar concept: Dark Star Thresh or whever their leader is may have recognized Lux's power and corrupted her mind to help them rain destruction and despair upon the world (something like the Legion in Warcraft or any number of similar concepts in many fantasy worlds). 
I think the Void Lux concept with the particles from the video would be an awesome look for such a Lux skin.

Very good point; skins should NOT be limited to accurate portrayals of lore or character. Otherwise, skins like the holiday sets wouldn't be made. Some of the best skins in the game (Arcade sets, Pool Party sets, DUNKMASTER Darius, Corporate Mundo, etc.) are only so great BECAUSE they have such a separate connection to the actual character. By expanding the connection's range, creativity and the chance for really kickass skins expand with it.

I've wanted to make a 'dark' Lux since I started playing LoL! This is a really impressive roundup of artists work, thanks for including proper links.

On skins fitting champions; each champion has three 'core pillars' that are the key traits we think define them. When we work on a skin our goal is to retain one or two of those while radically changing the others.

For example Dunkmaster Darius is no longer a noxian general, but now a noxian team captain. No longer an axe weilding warrior, but a backboard slamming dunkmaster. He does however retain his merciless in-your face attitude.

Santa Gragas - still gross
Arcade Ezreal - still cocky
Pool Party Graves - still can't have a cigar

I think our best skins do this 'keep one change two' on many levels. Not just pillars but silhouette, visual hooks, colour pallet etc. where we find players losing the champion is when we push too far and change all the pillars (Lunar Wraith Caitlyn comes to mind). These lessons were tricky to learn, and I don't think we've got it figured out 100% yet, but I think they help make skins resonant.

Thank you :)
